articles.author: Brendan Carlin Politicial Correspondent
articles.title: Some striking train drivers 'earn more than £100000' rail sources claim - Daily Mail
articles.description: Ahead of yet more stoppages this week, Transport Secretary Grant Shapps (pictured) angrily insisted that drivers and other rail workers already had 'generous salaries … paid for by the public'.
articles.content:
Striking rail workers were yesterday accused of demanding pay rises at the point of a gun amid claims that some drivers already earn over £100,000 a year.
